text: FK Metalac is a football club from Gornji Milanovac, Serbia. He currently competes in the First League of Serbia, the second competitive level of Serbian football.
textInvisible: The club was founded in 1961 as FK Radnik, and since 1965 it has the name FK Metalac. The home matches are played at the FK Metalac Stadium, which has a capacity of 4,600 seats. Club colors are blue and white.

text: Football Club Takovo is a Serbian football club from Gornji Milanovac. The club is part of the Sports Association Takovo and is currently competing in the Morava Zone, the fourth competitive level of Serbian football. Takovo was founded in July 1911 and is one of the oldest football clubs in Serbia.
The hall is fully equipped with the sports equipment of the Italian company SPORT-SYSTEM and meets the criteria for maintaining the highest quality sporting events.
textInvisible: The hall is fully air-conditioned with efficient heating on natural gas and cooling with the aid of electric chillers. The works on heating and cooling were carried out by ALFAKO company from Cacak.
